Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Toto Nyasaye niye wikalilanga likulu nende ashialo bikhaye okhurulaho ne nibirulaho abulaho wakhabiikalila halali Ye, toto ye ni Omuholo muno Omunji Wobulesheli

Ne betsuba khu Nyasaye eshitsubo shiabu eshikhongo mbu: “Omwikanyilisi nabetsela mbu balaba abalunjifu muno okhushilakhwo omukanda kundi kwosi kwosi.” Ne olwa Omwikanyilisi yaboolela shiyabametela shiosi shiosi tawe halali obukhayi

Khulwa okhufura khwabu khushialo, nende okhukhola ebifwanga ebibii ne ebifwanga ebibii shibikalushilanga halali khu ulia wabikhola. Ne shibalindanga tawe halali omulukha kwa balia abaranjilila khale, ne sholanyoola abukabukhani khumilukha chia Nyasaye tawe, nohomba sholanyoola abukalukhasio khumilukha chia Nyasaye tawe

Koo shibachendangakhwo khushialo mana balolakhwo shinga indukho yabalia bali imbeli wabu yali irie, ne bali nende amani muno okhushila bo? Ne shibulaho shinyala okhushila Nyasaye mwikulu nende khushialo. Toto ye ni Omumanyi muno Omunyali po

Ne Nyasaye abukulilanga Abandu khukabakholanga , shiyakhaleshelekhwo khushialo khuno isolo yosiyosi tawe, halali ababikhanga okhula ebise biarebwaho, ne olwebise biabu biliula (balirungwa) toto Nyasaye alolanga muno Abasumba bebe
Ya-Sin
Nditsuba khu Ikurani yamachesi
Toto ewe oli mulala Khubarumwa
Khunjila ingololofu
Okhwishia khwa Nyasaye Owamani Owobukoosia muno
Mbukho wikanyilisie Abandu ba Basamwana balekanyilisibwa tawe mana nabo bali mubukoyani
Obwatoto likhuwa liamala okhubura khubaanji mubo, mana shibasuubilanga tawe
Toto efwe khwaboya mwikosi mwabu nemikoye okhuula khubinwanwa, mana emirwe chiabu chilisa hekulu
Mana nikhura imbeli wabu eshikalilo nende inyuma wabu eshikalilo, mana nikhufunikha tsimoni tsiabu mana shibalolanga tawe
Ne nihalalasa awo khubo, nobekanyilisia nohomba obule okhubekanyilisia , shibalisuubila tawe
Toto ewe wikanyilisinjia ulia uloondanga ametsulisio mana naria Nyasaye Wetsimbabaasi, khukefisile, kho musuubisie eshileshelo nende omurungo omulayi
Toto efwe khulamusinjia abafu, ne khuhandikanga kabakholanga nende kabalekha inyuma. Ne buli eshindu khwashibikha mushitabu shinoosinjia
Ne bakanile imbakha nobachelasilia , Abandu bolukongo olwa betselwa nende Abarumwa
Olwa khwabarumila babili, nibabayingasia mana nikhubametela owakhataru nibaboola mbu: “ toto efwe khurumilwe khinywe.”
Nibaboola mbu: “enywe mulisa Abandu shinga efwe, ne (Nyasaye) Omunji Wetsimbabaasi shiyeshiakhwo shiosi shiosi tawe, ne enywe mukatinjia butswa.”
Baboola mbu: “Nyasaye wefu Omulesi amanyile mbu efwe toto khurumilwe khwinywe
Nekhubula elindi tawe halali okhusia likhuwa lili habulafu
Baboola mbu: “efwe khubekongola nimulalekhana ninafu tawe khulabalasa amachina ne mulanyoola eshinyasio eshikhongo okhurula khwifwe.”
Baboola mbu : “obubii bwenyu buli khwinywe, Shichila okhwitsulisibwa butswa, nohomba enywe muli Abandu babura eshichelo?”
Mana Omundu mulala niyetsa okhurula mumbeka wolukongo nayuukanga naboola mbu: “enywe Abandu banje muloonde Abarumwa bano.”
Muloonde balia abalabasaba omurungo tawe, nabo abeene nabalunjifu
Ne khulwa shina ndalalaama ulia wanoonga ne ewuwe namulikalusibwa
Koo endiile Abanyasaye bandi balali Ye. Omunji wetsimbabaasi niyanyenyela amabii okhusaba khwenyu shikhukhoonya shiosi shiosi tawe nohomba shibakhahabina tawe
Toto mana esie endio emba endi mubukori bwa habulafu
Toto esie usuubiile khu Nyasaye wenyu omulesi kho murechelesie
Naboolelwa mbu ; “injila mwikulu,” naboola mbu : “ Abayie Abandu banje bamanyanga khwo
Shingala Nyasaye wanje Omulesi yandesheele mana niyanda mubalia boluyali.”
